name: In-Game File Explorer
author: ${author}
description:
The in-game file explorer mod allows you to look around your systems files, and view/edit some file types:
.txt - The mod has a built in text-editor for text files. Files can be viewed, edited and saved without having to leave the game.
.png/.jpeg - The mod also include an image viewer!
.json - The mod includes a simple-to-use gui based in-game JSON editor.
